82883.summary: Some customers in the Clayburn area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82883.title: Sept 7 - Abbotsford (Clayburn) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

82880.title: Sept 7 - Edmonton (The Grange) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
